raw: *WCt52KW.pngYou can only find Zorua in Hordes. However, Zorua is disguised, so you need to lead with a Koffing or Weezing (due to the Reactive Gas Ability) to see who Zorua is (this is due to Zorua's Illusion Ability). Here is a video demonstration of this in action. It should be noted that wild Zorua does not hold any items naturally.
